rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ECC4700, ECF3900, ECX3900, ECX5470}
Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04, 05, 06, 09, 09-1, 09-4}
Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04, 05, 06, 09, 09-1, 09-4}

description: Outline of the Australian and overseas approaches to competition policy; the economic background to the Trade Practices Act; market definition issues; evaluation of restrictive trade practices and mergers or alliances; structural reform of industries, access and monopoly regulation.
